System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Parameter | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指示模糊处理工具对程序集、类型或成员采取指定的操作。

span.span: Instructs obfuscation tools to take the specified actions for an assembly, type, or member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性允许程序集作者为其二进制文件添加批注，以便模糊处理工具可以用最小的外部配置正确处理它们。The and attributes allow assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. 特性具有一个字符串属性。The attribute has a string property. 模糊处理工具可以映射到它们实现的功能，最好是通过使用 XML 配置文件的用户可以访问此属性的字符串值。Obfuscation tools can map the string values of this property to features they implement, preferably by using an XML configuration file that users can access. 定义两个功能字符串、"default"和"全部"。The defines two feature strings, "default" and "all". "Default"的字符串应映射到一个工具的默认模糊处理功能，"all"应映射到支持的一种工具的模糊处理功能的完整集合。The string "default" should map to the default obfuscation features of a tool, and "all" should map to the complete set of obfuscation features supported by a tool. 默认值属性为"全部"，启用模糊处理功能的完整集合。The default value of the property is "all", enabling the complete set of obfuscation features. 当应用于程序集，也适用于程序集内的所有类型。When applied to an assembly, also applies to all types within the assembly. 如果属性未指定，或设置为`true`，则此属性应用到所有成员也。If the property is not specified, or is set to `true`, the attribute applies to all members as well. 不会指定程序集是公共还是专用。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定程序集是公共或私有的使用属性。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use the attribute. 当应用于类和结构，也适用于所有类型的成员，如果属性未指定，或设置为`true`。When applied to classes and structures, also applies to all members of the type if the property is not specified, or is set to `true`. 当应用于方法、 参数、 字段和属性，该属性会影响仅应用于的实体。When applied to methods, parameters, fields, and properties, the attribute affects only the entity to which it is applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有两种类型的公共程序集：`Type1`和`Type2`。The following code example shows a public assembly with two types: `Type1` and `Type2`. 该程序集标记为与模糊处理，表示将标记要被视为公共的程序集 (即属性是`false`)。The assembly is marked for obfuscation with the , which marks the assembly to be treated as public (that is, the property is `false`). `Type1` 已标记为模糊处理，因为该程序集标记为模糊处理。`Type1` is marked for obfuscation because the assembly is marked for obfuscation. 一个成员`Type1`不会进行模糊处理，使用属性。One member of `Type1` is excluded from obfuscation, using the property. `Type2` 不会进行模糊处理，但其成员标记为模糊处理，因为属性是`false`。`Type2` is excluded from obfuscation, but its members are marked for obfuscation because the property is `false`. `MethodA`方法`Type2`使用值标记`"default"`为属性。The `MethodA` method of `Type2` is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 必须指定`false`有关属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为属性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 模糊处理工具应不去除该特性在模糊处理之后由于属性是`false`。The obfuscation tool should not strip the attribute after obfuscation because the property is `false`. 因为此代码示例中的所有其他属性在模糊处理之后, 去除属性未指定，因此默认为`true`。All the other attributes in this code example are stripped after obfuscation, because the property is not specified, and therefore defaults to `true`. 代码示例包含代码，以显示属性和它们的属性。The code example includes code to display the attributes and their properties. 此外可以通过打开与 DLL 检查的特性[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。You can also examine the attributes by opening the DLL with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会指定程序集是公共还是专用。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定程序集是公共或私有的使用。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示某一类型的特性是否应用到该类型的成员。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attribute of a type is to apply to the members of the type.

value.span: 如果该特性要应用到类型的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is to apply to the members of the type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该特性应用于成员时，将忽略此属性的值。The value of this property is ignored when the attribute is applied to a member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了一种类型，不会进行模糊处理，但因为，排除不应用于其成员属性是`false`。The following code example shows a type that is excluded from obfuscation, but the exclusion does not apply to its members because the property is `false`. 此代码是一个更大的示例可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Exclude { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Exclude : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应将类型或成员从模糊处理中排除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should exclude the type or member from obfuscation.

value.span: 如果应用该特性的类型或成员应从模糊处理中排除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type or member to which this attribute is applied should be excluded from obfuscation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了进行标记，以便从模糊处理中排除的类型。The following code example shows a type that is marked to be excluded from obfuscation. 不需要指定属性，因为它将默认为`true`，但显式指定可以在你的意图更明显。It is not necessary to specify the property, because it defaults to `true`, but specifying it explicitly makes your intent clear. 设置为`false`，以便从模糊处理中的排除不适用于类的成员。The is set to `false`, so that the exclusion from obfuscation does not apply to the members of the class. 也就是说，类名称是可见的但对成员进行模糊处理。That is, the class name is visible but the members are obfuscated. `MethodA`方法标记为值`"default"`为属性。The `MethodA` method is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 必须指定`false`有关属性，以便避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为属性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property in order to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此代码是一个更大的示例可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Feature { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Feature : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，该字符串值可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

value.span: 一个字符串值，可由模糊处理工具识别并指定处理选项。

span.span: A string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给此属性的值取决于使用的模糊处理工具。The value passed to this property depends on the obfuscation tool used. 建议该供应商的模糊处理工具至少支持"default"和"全部"。It is recommended that vendors of obfuscation tools support at least "default" and "all". 供应商可以将这些设置结合使用 XML 配置文件。Vendors can use these settings in conjunction with the XML configuration file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了标记的值的方法`"default"`为属性。The following code example shows a method that is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 必须指定`false`有关属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为属性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此代码是一个更大的示例可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StripAfterObfuscation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StripAfterObfuscation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应在处理后移除此特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove this attribute after processing.

value.span: 如果模糊处理工具应在处理后移除该特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的库将包含的另一个应用程序，并作为该应用程序的一部分进行模糊处理，则不应去除的属性。Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理应用到的代码实体。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示其属性是`false`以便模糊处理工具不会在模糊处理后去除特性。The following code example shows an whose property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 必须指定`false`有关属性以避免不包括`MethodA`从模糊处理，因为的默认值为属性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 此代码是一个更大的示例可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 类。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]
